dogecoin.text:
Dogechain isn’t just an upgrade; it’s an ecosystem for the #DogeArmy. Whether you're a fan of Dogecoin’s meme culture or its newfound utility, Dogechain is opening doors for #NFTs, #DeFi, #GameFi, and so much more👌

🧵13

Why Dogechain Matters❓️
 
Dogechain is turning Dogecoin into a DeFi powerhouse, aligning with the demands of today’s crypto enthusiasts. By embracing smart contracts, Dogecoin can compete with leading #blockchains. This evolution is bringing more utility to #Dogecoin

🧵12

With Dogechain, #Dogecoin can join the #DeFi ecosystem. Users can stake, borrow, lend, and swap tokens, bringing new use cases to $DOGE. The platform is also primed for NFTs, GameFi, and even metaverse applications - all powered by a meme coin that started as a joke.

🧵11

What Dogechain Brings to the Table❓️

🛠️ With Dogechain, Dogecoin holders can access DeFi, NFTs, GameFi, and more. By wrapping $DOGE into $wDOGE on Dogechain, users can explore an ecosystem filled with opportunities, all powered by their Dogecoin.

🧵8

Enter #Dogechain: The Game Changer 🎮 Dogechain was created to address Dogecoin’s limitations without replacing it. Built as an #EVM-compatible, PoS blockchain, Dogechain complements Dogecoin, adding scalability, security, and utility to the beloved meme coin.

🧵7

Dogecoin’s Environmental Footprint 👣 Dogecoin’s PoW protocol has also led to substantial energy use - over 6.54 TWh, comparable to the needs of a small country. As demand for $DOGE rises, its environmental impact grows. To evolve, Dogecoin needs a energy-efficient solution.

🧵6

Unlike newer, multi-functional tokens, Dogecoin can't support smart contracts, #NFTs, or #DeFi. As the world of DeFi and digital assets expands, Dogecoin’s single-use nature has become a limitation for its community, especially as other meme tokens unlock new possibilities.

🧵5

#Dogecoin may have made its mark as a fun, widely-used payment currency, but its capabilities haven't kept pace. Built as a fork of Litecoin, Dogecoin relies on an energy-intensive proof-of-work (PoW) model. 

🧵4

With endorsements from influencers like @elonmusk, Dogecoin skyrocketed in popularity, becoming one of the top cryptos along with Bitcoin and Ethereum.

🧵3

Hello guys! 👋

So today, we will be taking a deep dive into one of the OGs of #Memecoin, #Dogecoin and how its utility has expanded over the years thanks to @DogechainFamily.

So, I'll title this thread "DOGE on Dogechain: Expanding Utility for the OG Memecoin".

So LFG 🙂
